metadata.title: CVE-2021-40985 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
A stack-based buffer under-read in htmldoc before 1.9.12, allows attackersto cause a denial of service via a crafted BMP image to image_load_bmp.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-40985` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

htmldoc - 1.9.13-1
htmldoc-common - 1.9.13-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: htmldoc package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.9.13-1').
